citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 on 3/28/2025.
The inspector arrived to the facillity at 11:13 and spoke with the licensee by phone at 11:15 and was told that there was
no available person to conduct an inspection at that time.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a violation of the AWA and regulations.
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 on 3/28/2025. 
The inspector arrived to the facillity at 11:13 and spoke with the licensee by phone at 11:15 and was told that there was 
no available person to conduct an inspection at that time. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a violation of the AWA and regulations. 
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
